messages.subject: Education of little tree
messages.msgSnippet: Could you tell me how you found that movie?  I have asked for it in several places all no one has heard of it or is it in there files.  Thanks,  Bonnie Steph
messages.messageBody:
Could you tell me how you found that movie? I have asked for it in several places all no one has heard of it or is it in there files. Thanks, Bonnie

Steph wrote:
We watched The Education of Little Tree movie this past weekend, and were
happy to
see such a movie made so honestly. It didn't glamorize one way against
another as being
The Anwer, yet it well-addressed a long history of intentional blindness
that some don't
recognize as being alive and well.

Jmo,
Steph





Bpaglial@...
the great thing to learn about life is, first,
to not do what you don't want to do, and,
second, to do what you want to do.
--Margaret Anderson
